Discrete time state transition models

2019-09-07

Source: vignettes/dtstm.Rmd
dtstm.Rmd

1 Overview

2 An example model for HIV/AIDs

transitions <- matrix(c(1251, 350, 116, 17,
             0, 731, 512, 15,
             0, 0, 1312, 437),
             ncol = 4, nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)
print(transitions)
##      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
## [1,] 1251  350  116   17
## [2,]    0  731  512   15
## [3,]    0    0 1312  437

4 Simulation

4.1 Constructing the economic model

The economic model consists of a model for disease progression and models for assigning utility and cost values to health states. Since we are performing a PSA, we must specify the number of times to sample the parameters.

n_samples <- 1000
